mapper.select: select * from BUCKETLIST where FAMILYSEQ = #{familySeq} and TYPE = 'Family' order by regDate DESC
SELECT u.userName, r.bucketReplySeq, r.bucketSeq, r.regDate, r.replyContents, r.userId FROM bucketreply r JOIN itdauser u on r.userId = u.userId WHERE bucketSeq = #{bucketSeq} ORDER BY r.regDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUCKETLIST (bucketSeq ,userId, regDate, title, contents, goalDate, type, familySeq, visible, finishDate, fileName, fileData) VALUES (bucketSeq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{title}, #{contents}, NULL, #{type}, #{familySeq}, 'y', NULL, #{fileName}, #{fileData})
INSERT INTO BUCKETREPLY (bucketReplySeq, bucketSeq, regDate, replyContents, userId) VALUES (bucketReplySeq.NEXTVAL, #{bucketSeq}, SYSDATE, #{replyContents}, #{userId})
